This dress could be cute and has many positive going for it. The fabric is soft , it has nice contouring from the waist through the hips, and a flattering strap placement.  the problem is ALL in the chest area. Instead of having the tie string be fed through the cups, it is sewn on to elastic. So when you pull them tightly, it pulls the elastic, expanding the fabric (vs gathering it further) and making it very oddly shaped. There is no tension in the cups so my post baby chest was bean shaped (even with cakes in). Very unflattering and super bouncy. I would not recommend for larger boobs that are not still in peak perk.

评论概述: This is a well worthwhile dupe
类型: Team Name: Wide shoulder strapsSize: 8-10Color: Solid Red
评论详情: I was impressed at the quality of this dupe. I didn’t really want to buy a $200 dress when I was unsure about the fabric as their dresses are known to be loud when you move. But the dress is to die for. So I decided to try this $50 dupe first. The waist cinch of the corset on the back is fantastic and works like the real dress. There’s actual boning in the corset too. I do find that if your small chested you will have issue with coverage. I tied the cups as tight as I could and I still feel gaping for a B cup. This is the only part that really worries me. The house of CB dress has 2 breast size options which I now know why. I liked this dupe so much that I decided to have this tailored. Because even if I bought the original dress I’d still have to get it hemmed because I’m too short (5’1). So I paid 90$ to shorten the dress and to raise the thigh slit and it’s the most perfect dress now! The tailor in particular was really obsessed with this dress too. I got about 2.5 inches off the length and raised the slit the same.

类型: Team Name: Wide shoulder strapsSize: 12-14Color: Blue
评论详情: So i read a lot of reviews. Seems like people are 50/50 on this dress. And i saw where people said it’s not for bigger chest. I agree with them. My boobs are sticking out on the side but in the dress it almost looks like i have 4 boobs i tried to close up so you can see. Now its not that noticeable and i dont have many options for this family party im going to so im gonna have to make it work. In terms of sizing it definitely wasn’t an easy zip. If i was any bigger the dress wouldn’t fit. My waist is 40 inch and size 38dd for reference. I don’t like this pattern on me so i will be returning and ordering in brown.  Update so i ordered the brown and the zipper bust. Clearly this dress isn’t made for me.

评论详情: I bought this for a graduation I was attending because it looked like dresses on social media but at a much cheaper price. In person the design and pattern are very lovely however the quality of the fabric is lacking; it is very thin and cheap feeling. Also the corset design in the back looks a bit awkward if pulled tight which is a downside. That being said I have worn it multiple times as it is very pretty and okay for the price.
